person:biography.p:
Seva is a software engineer at
Zend Technologies
since 2001.
First 5 years Seva worked as a web developer, gaining experience with various web technologies and techniques, e.g. PHP 4/5, LAMP integration, XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, SOA, AJAX etc.
In 2006 Seva joined Development Tools group to contribute his knowledge and experience in PHP and Web to develop new generation of IDE for PHP oriented Web development.
